title: Fate/Grand Order (FGO) Tier List
description: This is a Fate/Grand Order (FGO) tier list. The list is based on the opinions of various players and may not be accurate for all players.
heading: Fate/Grand Order (FGO) Tier List
introText: This is a Fate/Grand Order (FGO) tier list. The list is based on the opinions of various players and may not be accurate for all players. It is also subject to change as new Servants are released and the game meta evolves. The tier list is divided into S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier.
